DOC.brief_summary: This survey conduct South America . The aim survey investigate hypoglycaemia among Insulin-treated patient diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Survey Hypoglycaemia Among Insulin-treated Patients With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Informed consent obtain studyrelated activity The following patient consider eligible inclusion study : Patients T1DM ( Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus ) T2DM ( Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ) treat insulin 12 month patient least 18 year age time survey Mental incapacity , unwillingness language barrier preclude adequate understanding cooperation Illiterate patient patient otherwise unable complete write survey Nonambulatory patient Simultaneous participation clinical study investigational product
